{"id":1185684364,"question_id":441,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1708857517,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1185684364/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n      long l=0;\n      long h=n;\n      while(l<=h){\n          long k=l+(h-l)/2;\n\n          long t=k*(k+1)/2;\n          if(t==n) return k;\n          else if (t>n) h=k-1;\n          else l=k+1;\n\n      }  \n      return h;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
